content.content:
1974
Preceded by

Year
1976
Followed by

You may also be looking for Third Age 1975.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1975.

content.title: May
content.content: 9 - J. A. Bayona, Spanish director, is born.

content.title: June
content.content:
6 - Hugo Dyson, Inkling, dies.
11 - Actor John Tui is born.
? - Jared Lobdell's A Tolkien Compass is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
5-7 - Oxonmoot 1975.
? - Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo is published.

content.title: December
content.content: 1 - An Extrapolation on The Silmarillion is published.

? - Artist Jenny Dolfen is born.
? - Author J.W. Braun is born.
? - 1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is published.
? - The Hobbit Calendar 1976 is published.
? - Grenadier Models Inc., which were to release metal miniatures based on The Lord of the Rings, is founded.
? - The first Romanian-language edition of the The Hobbit (O poveste cu un hobbit), is published.
? - The Siege of Minas Tirith, a board game, is released.
Years
1972 1973 1974 1975 1976 1977 1978
